document_data.name: Augrek Brighthelm
document_data.mainbody: '''Augrek Brighthelm''' was a deputy in [[Bryn Shander]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Usually, Augrek was found at the southwest gate of the city, where she welcomed all visitors with a well-rehearsed speech about the wonders of Bryn Shander.
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], Augrek was at the gate when [[giant]]s attacked the city.
document_data.Personality: Augrek had a good heart. She truly wanted to protect her city. She also loved Sheriff [[Markham Southwell]].
